EmailTemplate.subject: It’s time to show why governments should work with you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> It’s time for action – take your LTE case to government Mobile operators are ideally situated to help governments provide mission-critical mobile broadband for their public safety users.
Our latest Executive Summary brings together the operational benefits that mobile operators can bring to governments:
- Less time to build a working network - Avoid the expense and time of developing expertise - Shift network funding from CAPEX to OPEX - Support change by purchasing services rather than a network - Retain valuable revenue from spectrum © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
